com.tractrac.clientmodule
Class ControlPoint

java.lang.Object
  com.tractrac.clientmodule.details.Attachments
      com.tractrac.clientmodule.details.IdBase
          com.tractrac.clientmodule.details.IdBaseNamed
              com.tractrac.clientmodule.ControlPoint

public class ControlPoint
extends IdBaseNamed

Encapsulates data related to a specific Control Point of a TracTrac Event.

An instance of this class has a unique id and a name. Furthermore it has a flag indicating whether it represents two buoys/marks or just one.

Custom data may be attached to each Control Point instance.

Use Event.addControlPoint(java.util.UUID, java.lang.String, boolean) to create a new Control Point.

Version:
2.0
Author:
TracTrac
See Also:
Event
